message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $9,500. This is a special offer considering the high quality and the benefits it will bring to you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're offering, but unfortunately, I'm looking to stay within a budget of $8,000. I'd be happy to make a counteroffer of $8,500.  This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident this product would be a great asset to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose a price of $8,750 for the product. This still allows you to acquire a valuable asset while staying within your financial limits.
